idea:
Uncharted is a online platform which is an informative app which ideate travel around unrecognised places in India by masses (promoting atma nirbhar bharat). Our moto is to generate more tourism internally, because why travel outside India when we have beauty within.


With this initiative we can not only promote tourism in india but can generate employment for people living in lesser known destinations. We are further looking for development of resorts, animal friendly space, centuries for animals in this initiative.
name: Uncharted

idea:
Hi! I'm Kunal Gujar

This is my Industrial design portfolio, that showcases all the projects that I have worked on as a student and as a professional designer.

Personally, I consider Design as a responsibility that comes with power of self-expression. Designing is the ability to change lives, define the state of the systems and to be yourself. I believe in a very systematic process oriented approach that is endorsed by my skills which range from research, ideation all the way to prototyping that pivots at user experience being at the center. Also my professional industry experience has nurtured me into a pragmatic thinker who can deliver the right solution within the industry constraints. 


Let’s have a talk and collaborate for a better Future !
name: kunal Gujar

idea:
D-Kit Media Pvt. Ltd is a Green medium for digital print which is Proudly made in India, It is 100% recyclable & Eco Friendly & PVC free, which replaced Hazardous Flex and Vinyl available in the Market, This media is made from Polyethylene (PE) & Non-Woven fabric and multiple time recyclable materials and has 0% chlorine content. Our green media add values to Environment by saving Trees, Land Pollution, water pollution & Air pollution.

This is high performance Digital print media, remarkably light weight & incredibly durable.

 This media is compatible with all solvent, eco solvent and UV, Ink jet, offset & HP latex machines. Suitable for an extensive range of indoor and outdoor signage applications like Outdoor banners, Sign boards, hoardings, standees, and other point of sale displays.

The machines, materials, and technologies in current Indian flex Industry are mostly imported from overseas, predominantly from China, Korea or Tiwan.

However D-Kit Green media is made in India & made for India, it will surely help to become vocal for local products in line up with Prime minister Modi’s vision of Aatma Nirbhar Bharat Abhiyaan (Self-Reliant India Movement) and make it global & help Indian economy.
name: D-KIT MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
